segments.text: Do you know the restrictions about the carry-on items for exiting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can take small sum of money and important items such as passport and keys and business documents and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the things that are forbidden to take in departure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a long list of those things forbidden , including explosives , gum opium and precious cultural relies and so on .
segments.speaker: S2
